## Github packages

- [`riskclustr`](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/riskclustr/index.html), a package of functions for the study of etiologic heterogeneity
- [`ezfun`](https://github.com/zabore/ezfun), a package of personal utility functions to generate tables for use in R Markdown reports
- [`condsurv`](https://github.com/zabore/condsurv), a package for conditional survival analysis
